main.name: Hi, I am Hasan
main.description: I am a Full Stack developer and I love learning new things.
main.bio:
I have a Masterâ€™s degree in digital electronics from the Electrical Engineering Department of the Sharif University of Technology, Tehran, Iran. 
As an engineer, I like to work in various fields. To this aim, I have experience in different areas such as computer vision, machine learning, medical imaging, image processing, signal processing, and mobile app development. I like these fields, especially projects that utilize them in real-life applications. For extra information please check my CV.
main.contactmessage: I like to connect to people around the world, feel free to start communication

resume.skillmessage: I am a real self-learner! I have learned all skills by my own!
